en.Intro paragraph: usually in English, sometimes in arabic, i go with novels and short stories, beside other genres.\nLately started learning French, and picked some french books, starting with "L'étranger" by Albert Campus.

ar.Intro paragraph: عاده باللغة الإنجليزية، واحيانا باللغة العربية، أقرأ القصص القصيرة، على غرار انواع أخرى.
